snippet: A federal judge has refused to block Alabama’s strict new immigration law while the Obama administration appeals a ruling last week that upholds major portions of it.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has refused to block Alabama’s strict new immigration law while the Obama administration appeals a ruling last week that upholds major portions of it.

headline.main: Alabama: Immigration Law to Stay in Place During Appeal
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Immigration Law To Stay in Place During Appeal
headline.seo: In Alabama, Immigration Law to Stay in Place During Appeal
